regen.absent_element: real-time notifications and alerts for performance issues and computation errors
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide real-time notifications and alert relevant personnel of any identified performance issues and computation errors, ensuring prompt corrective measures are taken.

regen.new_specification: The system shall provide real-time notifications to relevant personnel for any identified performance issues or computation errors.

regen.new_specification: The BE shall report all out-of-tolerance conditions for computation errors to relevant personnel.
